body: Do you mean from just `doPythonReadInto`/`doPythonWrite` or also `isUnsupportedOperation` and `doPythonIO`? I don't have a good intuition for when to (or not to) inline a function.
body_html: Do you mean from just doPythonReadInto/doPythonWrite or also isUnsupportedOperation and doPythonIO? I don't have a good intuition for when to (or not to) inline a function.
